about_the_game:
● Game Summary

Title: The North Star of the Heart (Full voice version)

Type: Male ADV game for love

Target: 1-3 people

Number of endings: 4

Role difference: 100+

CG: 20+

"The North Star of the Heart" is a word game with love and suspense as the theme, simple UI and layout, multi-ending, multi-branch design structure, through click options, and full voice of story characters, to create realistic scenes and rich plot in the game.

Players in the process of play play the protagonist of the story Gu Yan, to promote the plot of the players will gradually understand childhood sweetheart Suqi Luo, hospital director Ye Shijin, and Mu's miss Mu Xinming. Between these three girls with different personalities, Gu Yan struggles to find himself. Can he get rid of the shadow of the past and find his own memory and future?

The language support of this game is Chinese, the English version will be released in the future, and the Japanese version is currently considering the feasibility.

● Introduction to the story

All happened to Mu's pharmaceutical industry pillar of Jiaoyang City, Gu Yan is a computer science graduate, participated in the game production, in the industry is a little famous, because of mental illness temporarily can not find work, temporary freelance identity to take up work, and childhood friend Su Qi Luo lived a dull daily.

By the strange middleman introduced the work of the production of the hospital system, the president of the hospital is a woman of different words Ye Shijin, have special attention to Gu Yan, because Ye Shijin's relationship, also met Mu's big miss Mu Xinming, their encounter seems to be a conspiracy, not by chance, about Gu Yan's past secret floating on the surface...

● Character introduction

Su Qi Luo, 22 years old, 159cm, Gu Yan's childhood sweetheart, like Gu Yan very much, do not want to let Gu Yan be hurt again, cheerful personality, in the eyes of others to Gu Yan good to a little crazy, always follow Gu Yan, until university, work did not change, stick to Gu Yan. He bought a amulet painted with purple microstar there to protect Gu Yan.

Ye Shijin, 27 years old, 165cm, a doctor in a private hospital (black doctor in a small clinic). Living with hatred, driven by the desire to bring down that family, expose the truth behind it, and plunge them into endless pain.

In the process of revenge, it is the daughter of the family that gives her warmth, which is a light that illuminates the dark life. Clearly approaching her is to steal information, she knows that her daughter has nothing to do with the incident, but her family has original sin, which cannot be forgiven.

Mu Xinming, 24 years old, 172cm, Mu's apple of the eye, the beloved princess, from birth has been a variety of people flatter, she felt himself completely by the "Mu's big miss" halo covered, no one cares about the real themselves, only Ye Shijin to their true treatment, from small to big only Ye Shijin a bosom friend, the total corner of friends.

Player communication group: 391858742

Feedback and suggestions are welcome!

content_descriptors.notes: Adult content appears only in the plot of some chapters and is used for textual and graphic descriptions of the plot.
